sn56.44:4.1: “Yo hi, bhikkhave, evaṃ vadeyya:
sn56.44:4.3: dukkhanirodhagāminiṃ paṭipadaṃ ariyasaccaṃ yathābhūtaṃ anabhisamecca sammā dukkhassantaṃ karissāmī’ti—
sn56.44:5.2: ‘ahaṃ kūṭāgārassa heṭṭhimaṃ gharaṃ akaritvā uparimaṃ gharaṃ āropessāmī’ti—
sn56.44:5.4: evameva kho, bhikkhave, yo evaṃ vadeyya:
sn56.44:5.6: dukkhanirodhagāminiṃ paṭipadaṃ ariyasaccaṃ yathābhūtaṃ anabhisamecca sammā dukkhassantaṃ karissāmī’ti—
sn56.44:6.1: Yo ca kho, bhikkhave, evaṃ vadeyya:
sn56.44:6.3: dukkhanirodhagāminiṃ paṭipadaṃ ariyasaccaṃ yathābhūtaṃ abhisamecca sammā dukkhassantaṃ karissāmī’ti—
sn56.44:7.2: ‘ahaṃ kūṭāgārassa heṭṭhimaṃ gharaṃ karitvā uparimaṃ gharaṃ āropessāmī’ti—
sn56.44:7.4: evameva kho, bhikkhave, yo evaṃ vadeyya:
sn56.44:7.6: dukkhanirodhagāminiṃ paṭipadaṃ ariyasaccaṃ yathābhūtaṃ abhisamecca sammā dukkhassantaṃ karissāmī’ti—
sn56.44:8.1: Tasmātiha, bhikkhave, ‘idaṃ dukkhan’ti yogo karaṇīyo … pe …
